name: Fou: Your Virtual Pet Game
description:
Fou is you new virtual pet that LOVES playing, sleeping eating, and more. Now it's your oportunity to download this game and adopt your very own Fou! Buy food for feeding him, buy him clothes, earn coins by playing mini games, and adopt plants on the garden! Fou wants everybody to play with him, so what are you waiting for? Download the game now and start playing with Fou!

Inspired by Pou and Tamagotchi.

WebGL is needed to play this game.
